name: Dfhg-dev
tagline: Digital Fragmenta Historicorum Graecorum (DFHG): a machine-corrected version of the five volumes of Karl Müller's Fragmenta Historicorum Graecorum.
body:
#Welcome to dfhg-dev!

##About
This repository contains machine-corrected [EpiDoc](http://sourceforge.net/p/epidoc/wiki/Home/) versions of the five volumes of Karl Müller's _Fragmenta Historicorum Graecorum_ (FHG) as part of the [Digital Fragmenta Historicorum Graecorum (DFG)](http://www.dh.uni-leipzig.de/wo/projects/open-greek-and-latin-project/digital-fragmenta-historicorum-graecorum-dfhg-project/) project at the University of Leipzig. The files are encoded by the _Open Greek and Latin_ [research team](http://www.dh.uni-leipzig.de/wo/projects/open-greek-and-latin-project/) (researchers and student assistants).
While adequate, more can and should be done to improve the XML (the -dev(elopment) suffix indicates the repository is open to improvement).

If you want to help or contribute to the encoding process, please read the following documentation:
* [DFHG Guidelines (1.0)](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1T6_2QXx1NVRE5irlQtYKtgkZhJTcq07_wjrWhoRpO1k/edit).
* [DFHG Authors](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0AjbUiC-X1utCdERpVExHbko2R3luUjMtYm9neUxCVnc&usp=drive_web#gid=0). 

For a full description of the DFHG project, please visit our [website](http://www.dh.uni-leipzig.de/wo/open-philology-project/digital-fragmenta-historicorum-graecorum-dfhg-project/).

##Contents
For a comprehensive view of the contents of the FHG, click [here](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0AjbUiC-X1utCdERpVExHbko2R3luUjMtYm9neUxCVnc#gid=0). Authors encoded thus far are (authors are listed according to the order of Müller's FHG):

###Volume 1
* [Charon Lampsacenus](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_1/Charon%20Lampsacenus)
* [Hellanicus Lesbius] (https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_1/Hellanicus%20Lesbius)
* [Acusilaus Argivus] (https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_1/Acusilaus%20Argivus)
* [Antiochus Syracusanus](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_1/Antiochus%20Syracusanus)
* [Philistus Syracusanus](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_1/Philistus%20Syracusanus)
* [Phylarchus] (https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_1/Phylarchus)
* [Clitodemus] (https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_1/Clitodemus)
* [Phanodemus] (https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_1/Phanodemus)
* [Androtion] (https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_1/Androtion)
* [Demon] (https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_1/Demon)
* [Ister Cyrenaeus](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_1/Ister%20Cyrenaeus)

###Volume 2
* [Cadmus Milesius](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/blob/master/Volume_2/dfhg2cadm_grc.xml)
* [Hippys Rheginus](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_2/Hippys%20Rheginus)
* [Eugeon Samius](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_2/Eugeon%20Samius)
* [Simonides Ceus](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_2/Simonides%20Ceus)
* [Xenomedes Ceus](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_2/Xenomedes%20Ceus)
* [Ion Chius](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_2/Ion%20Chius)
* [Stesimbrotus Thasius](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_2/Stesimbrotus%20Thasius)
* [Hippias Eleus](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_2/Hippias%20Eleus)
* [Damastes Sigeus](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_2/Damastes%20Sigeensis)
* [Anaximander Milesius](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_2/Anaximander%20Milesius)
* [Aristippus Cyrenaeus](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_2/Aristippus%20Cyrenaeus)
* [Dioscorides](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_2/Dioscorides)
* [Phanias Eresius] (https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_2/Phanias%20Eresius)
* [Leo Byzantius] (https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_2/Leo%20Byzantius)
* [Clytus Milesius](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_2/Clytus%20Milesius)
* [Diyllus Atheniensis](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_2/Diyllus%20Atheniensis)
* [Lycus Rheginus](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_2/Lycus%20Rheginus)
* [Nymphodorus Syracusanus] (https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_2/Nymphodorus%20Syracusanus)
* [Demochares Leuconoensis] (https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_2/Demochares%20Leuconoensis)
* [Idomeneus Lampsacenus](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_2/Idomeneus%20Lampsacenus)
* [Craterus Macedo](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_2/Craterus%20Macedo)
* [Persaeus Cittiensis](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_2/Persaeus%20Cittiensis)

###Volume 3
* [Nymphis Heracleensis](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_3/Nymphis%20Heracleensis)
* [Alexandrides Delphus](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/dfhg-dev/tree/master/Volume_3/Alexandrides%20Delphus)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
